Package WekaJavaWrapper

Class Normalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • WekaJavaWrapper.Normalizer
  • public class Normalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    A object with functions to normalize a arff or csv file or single instance to a new csv file.

      A object with functions to normalize a arff or csv file or single instance to a new csv file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Normalizer

        public Normalizer​(java.util.Hashtable means,
                  java.util.Hashtable sd,
                  java.lang.String header,
                  java.util.Hashtable attrIndexes)
        A object with functions to normalize a arff or csv file or single instance to a new csv file.
        Parameters:
        means - a list of means as doubles used for scaling normalization
        sd - a list of standard deviations as doubles used for scaling normalization
        header - a comma separated header for the output csv or also input file if it is a csv

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:
        inputFile - input file arff as a file path String
        outputCsv - output file csv as a file path String

      • createNormCsvFromCsvFile

        public void createNormCsvFromCsvFile​(java.lang.String csvFile,
                                     java.lang.String outputFilePath)
        normalises from a csv file and creates a new normalised csv file.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - : filepath to the csv file that needs to be normalised
        outputFilePath - : filepath to the output csv file that is normalised

      • createNormCsvFromInstance

        public void createNormCsvFromInstance​(java.lang.String instance,
                                      java.lang.String outputFilePath)
        Normalises one instance and puts it a csv file
        Parameters:
        instance - : a single instance as a String[] with 10 atributes
        outputFilePath - : The file path for the normalised output as a csv

      • getHeader

        public java.lang.String getHeader()

        returns the header of the file that will be normalised

        Parameters:
